title: Groups Schema
description: A schema to add regenerative economy Groups to the Murmurations Index.

name.title: Group Name
name.description: The name of the group, project, organization, etc.

primary_url.title: Primary URL
primary_url.description: The unique and definitive website address for the group (e.g., our-group.org or many-groups.org/our-group)

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the group's purpose and activities

locality.title: Locality
locality.description: The city or town where the group is located

country_name.title: Country
country_name.description: The country where the group is located

image.title: Logo
image.description: A logo or other image representing the group (preferably a square image)

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Keywords that describe the group's purpose and activities

geographic_scope.title: Geographic Scope
geographic_scope.description: The geographic scope of the group's activities

schema.name: groups_schema-v0.0.1
schema.purpose: To map groups within the regenerative economy.
